title: Daily computer usage penetration in Great Britain 2006 - 2017 , by age
summary: This statistic shows the Daily computer usage penetration of Great Britain Britain from 2006 to 2017 .
In 2017 , 65+ continued to be the Daily usage country of Great Britain Britain at 51 % .
Great Britain is a privately held , international home Britain company that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture such as beds , chairs desks , appliances and home accessories .
gold: This statistic displays daily computer usage penetration in Great Britain , by age , in 2006 and in the years from 2013 to 2017 excluding 2016.
In 2017 , 79 percent of 16 to 24 year olds used the computer daily , up from 63 percent in 2006 .
